Package org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper

This package provides classes for Java Bean to RDF mapping.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
CriteriaDeserializer Defines a deserializer applicable on a specific type of classes.
CriteriaSerializer<T> Decides wether or not a seriazer can be applied on an object.
DeserializationContext Context used for deserialization.
DeserializationSupport  
Deserializer Defines an object able to deserialize a class.
SerializationContext Defines the context of serialization.
SerializationSupport<T> Defines any method to provide serialization support.
Serializer<T> This class serializes a specific bean.
 

Class Summary
BaseDeserializer Useful base class for writing a Deserializer.
BaseMapper  
BaseSerializer<T> Base class for serializer classes.
BeanDeserializer Bean deserializer implementation.
BeanSerializer Default serializer for Java beans.
CollectionDeserializer Default deserializer for collections.
CollectionSerializer Dafault serializer for Collection classes.
CustomSubjectBean  
DeserializationManager This class performs the RDF to bean conversion.
EnumDeserializer Default deserializer for enumerations.
EnumSerializer Defines a serializer for the enumerations.
Identifier Defines the result of a serialization.
Issue Represents a non blocking error occurred while performing binding operations.
MapSerializer Default serializer for Map classes.
PrimitiveDeserializer Primitive class deserializer.
PrimitiveSerializer Serializer for primitive types.
QueryEndpoint Endpoint to perform query on the triple data set.
SerializationManager This class performs the bean to RDF conversion.
StaticBeanDeserializer Static deserializer for a generic Bean.
StaticBeanSerializer Defines the default static serializer for Java beans.
StaticCollectionSerializer Serializer for bags.
StaticMapSerializer Default static serializer for Map classes.
 

Exception Summary
DeserializationException Defines any error occurred during deserialization.
SerializationException Defines an exception occurred during serialization.
 

Package org.sindice.rdfcommons.beanmapper Description

This package provides classes for Java Bean to RDF mapping.
